summary: Administrative & HR professional with 10+ years of experience in HR, recruiting, employee relations, workers' compensation and benefits, employee records, and compliance. Holds a Master of Arts (Honors) in Human Resource Development from Bowie State University with a 4.0 GPA. Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to communicate effectively with all organizational levels. Skilled in policy analysis, training and development, project management, onboarding, HRIS, and high-volume workforce support; proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and ADP.

experience.title: Sales & Customer Service Rep
experience.description: Manage high-volume workload in a sales and customer service environment (approximately 550 customers per week); analyze customer needs to recommend products and provide customer service to drive sales; achieved 100% customer service satisfaction; assist current and new reps with processes, onboarding, product knowledge; conduct exit interviews; collaborate with HR partners for year-end talent reviews; participate in recruitment and job description development; assess employee performance and issue disciplinary notices; handle 401(k), FMLA, workers' compensation, benefits; manage personnel files and payroll-related records; coordinate benefits enrollment and orientation communications; design and implement onboarding and new hire packages; support social media initiatives for applicant search; liaise with IT to streamline onboarding; organize employee schedules and communications.

experience.title: HR Generalist
experience.description: Provided support to staff regarding policies, procedures, and practices; compiled and maintained employee records and payroll data; assisted with recruiting, processing applications, and onboarding; created and maintained employee files; administered compensation programs; oversaw HR processes and analytics; maintained organization charts and employee directory; contributed to benefits administration; ensured compliance with federal, state, and local laws; prepared reports from personnel records; supported payroll and reporting activities.

experience.title: Office Manager
experience.description: Provided administrative and business support to the firm, CEO and executive team; coordinated conference calls, board meetings, travel, and special events; negotiated favorable terms with vendors, saving significant costs; improved office efficiency with organized filing systems; maintained CEO's calendar; supported managers with onboarding and recruitment-related activities; conducted market research and reported findings; developed and maintained databases; supported client relations and reporting; facilitated communication between administration and the executive team.

education.degree: Master of Arts in Human Resource Development

certifications: Certificate in Project Management, Bowie State University (March 2011)
Graduate Certificate in Organizational Development, Bowie State University
